Package org.netbeans.lib.editor.util.swing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockCompare
    Comparing of position block X to position block Y.
    DocumentListenerPriority
    Priorities of firing of document listeners being added to a document.
    DocumentUtilities
    Various utility methods related to swing text documents.
    ElementUtilities
    Various utility methods related to elements.
    GapBranchElement
    Branch element that uses gap list to maintain its child elements.
    MutablePositionRegion
    A pair of positions delimiting a text region in a swing document.
    PositionComparator
    Comparator for Position objects.
    PositionRegion
    A pair of positions delimiting a text region in a swing document.
